remarks: Define the hyperbolic sine function (sinh).  We define it this way for ~ cmpt , which requires the form ` ( x e. A |-> B ) ` .  See ~ sinhval-named for a simple way to evaluate it.  We define this function by dividing by ` _i ` , which uses fewer operations than many conventional definitions (and thus is more convenient to use in metamath).  See ~ sinh-conventional for a justification that our definition is the same as the conventional definition of sinh used in other sources.  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 20-Apr-2015.)
statement: df-sinh $p |- sinh = ( x e. CC |-> ( ( sin ` ( _i x. x ) ) / _i ) ) $.
